name: The Dynamic Duo!
description:
The Dynamic Duo!

While someone on the ground recolects bullets, places bombs and escapes from the incredible large amount of enemies, the other one shoot them down, send bombs and rebuild the ground.

Survive as many waves as you can.

You will have to play as a team to survive as long as you can, good communication is necessary.

INPUT MAP

F to pick up bombs and G to drop them.



Music: https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music
